item.title: Packet Capture on Cisco ISR
item.description: Determine the interface where you want to capture traffic: show ip interface brief Stage the capture filters: monitor capture CAP1 interface gig0/0/0 both monitor capture CAP1 match ipv4 any any Start the capture: monitor capture CAP1 start Reproduce the issue. Stop the capture: monitor capture CAP1 stop Export the capture to a TFTP server: monitor capture CAP1 export tftp://<tftp IP>/CAP1.pcap Disable the monitor capture: no monitor capture CAP1 Verify the capture: router1#sh monitor capture CAP1 buffer brief ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- # size timestamp source destination dscp protocol ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 0 118 0.
